sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './ProductPages.css'; const CurrencyNotes = ({ addToCart }) => { const currencyNotes = [ { denomination: '₹1', price: 50, description: 'Special serial number ₹1 note' }, { denomination: '₹5', price: 75, description: 'Special serial number ₹5 note' }, { denomination: '₹10', price: 100, description: 'Special serial number ₹10 note' }, { denomination: '₹20', price: 150, description: 'Special serial number ₹20 note' }, { denomination: '₹50', price: 200, description: 'Special serial number ₹50 note' }, { denomination: '₹100', price: 300, description: 'Special serial number ₹100 note' }, { denomination: '₹200', price: 500, description: 'Special serial number ₹200 note' }, { denomination: '₹500', price: 800, description: 'Special serial number ₹500 note' } ]; const handleAddToCart = (note) => { addToCart({ name: `${note.denomination} Currency Note`, price: note.price, description: note.description, category: 'Currency Notes' }); alert(`${note.denomination} note added to cart!`); }; return (

Currency Notes

Special serial number currency notes perfect for gifting on birthdays, anniversaries, and special occasions

{currencyNotes.map((note, index) => (
💵 {note.denomination}

{note.denomination} Currency Note

{note.description}

₹{note.price}
))}

About Our Currency Notes

🎯 Special Serial Numbers

We carefully select currency notes with serial numbers matching special dates like birthdays, anniversaries, or lucky numbers.

✨ Authentic & Genuine

All our currency notes are authentic and in excellent condition, perfect for gifting and collecting.

🎁 Perfect Gifts

Unique and meaningful gifts that create lasting memories for your loved ones.

); }; export default CurrencyNotes;
